availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Lynn and Jane Lynn. Married to Catherine Middleton Lynn in Lincoln County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1857. Father of Susannah Lynn. Farmer in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860. Farmer in Cumberland County, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 304B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 96-7.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Cumberland County, KY, February 1864, p. 217.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Lincoln County Marriages.
